title: I genuinely love the idea of the Pajama Guardians mini event.
body:
I was already working on a poster of all 10 star Guardians getting together for a reluctant movie/game night, for me, this basically confirms my fanart as pseudo Canon, as in, it's entirely possible to have happen.

{{sticker:sg-lux}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=niellopop,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=uE18Ru3M,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-07T02:31:03.223+0000)
>
> I think they're absolutely adorable. Especially Lulu and Ezreal's little tail.
>  {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}  I'm definitely buying both of them. Toooooo cute.

Honestly just hoping that the upcoming short story fuels the Realux ship.

https://imgur.com/a/MNiBdJc
I feel like its a little bullshit to keep on adding to the star guardians, but whatever.

> [{quoted}](name=breakordoom444,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=uE18Ru3M,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-07T02:31:48.596+0000)
>
> I feel like its a little bullshit to keep on adding to the star guardians, but whatever.

Well, Star Guardians are their own universe and probably tied for most expansive skin universe.  They have a massive fanbase and sell extremely well.  Not to mention anime and animesque stuff is extremely in right now.  Does that explain it?
